sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./Header.css" import {ReactComponent as ReactLogo} from "./logo.svg" import {useState} from "react" import data from "./data.json" export const Header = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(""); const onChange = (event) =>{ setValue(event.target.value)}; const onSearch = (searchTerm) => { setValue(searchTerm) } return (
{data.map((item)=> (
onSearch(item.videoName)} className="dropdown-row" key={item.full_name}>{item.videoName}
) )}
) }
